title: Tom Brady Returns, Deshaun Watson options, Davante Adams decision, Kirk Cousins deal, Free Agency frenzy
itunes:title: Tom Brady Returns, Deshaun Watson options, Davante Adams decision, Kirk Cousins deal, Free Agency frenzy
description:
Tom Brady's return highlights the latest edition of The Good Morning Football Podcast. Hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara discuss Brady's decision to play and what went into the decision. Talks around Deshaun Watson have started and it looks like there are 2 teams making offers for the franchise QB. Davante Adams informed the Packers he won't play on the franchise tag, so what can Aaron Rodgers do? Kirk Cousins has a new deal with the Vikings and Peter explains why he thinks this could be a bargain. We explore what teams will look like after Free Agency and ask who will be the next breakout defensive player in the NFL.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
